description:
Eloquera provides all the inherent advantages of an object database. Build and maintain your applications with unprecedented speed. Built on the .NET platform it uses LINQ and SQL interfaces. Performance is class leading and it is free to use.
The upcoming Eloquera Enterprise Database builds on and enhances the existing functionality. In particular it provides levels of reliability and availability suitable for the most critical and demanding environments.

You can have your very own fast, reliable, distributed cloud.

Performance is enhanced by state of the art load balancing. Maximum availability is guaranteed by fail over mechanisms and disaster recovery options, whilst information is securely protected at all times.
releaseNotes:
- Improved "WHERE field LIKE @str" performance. Where @str is a parameter
- Fixed parsing for ORDER BY fields that contain "desc" suffix
- DB client to check protocol version, not server version
summary: Eloquera Database is native object database for .NET environments
title: Eloquera Database
